item.title: Seongpil presented at 2025 IEIE Summer Conference
item.description: Seongpil presented his research work at the 2025 Summer Annual Conference of IEIE (IEIE 2025) held in Seoguipo-si, Jeju-do. Seongpil presented his research on performance analysis of a DRAM per-row activation counting mechanism. Good job, Seongpil!

item.title: CSArch Lab members attended CSC 2025
item.description: CSArch Lab members attended KIISE Computer System Society Conference 2025 (CSC 2025) held in Pyeongchang, Gangwon-do. Our lab members had a great time as the great researchers on computer system research fields presented keynotes and their research work during the conference. Prof. Gunjae Koo served as a program chair for CSC 2025.

item.title: Yewon and Jiwon presented at KCC 2024
item.description: Yewon and Jiwon presented their research work at Korea Computer Congress 2024 (KCC 2024) held in Seoguipo-si, Jeju-do. Yewon presented her research on security attacks on RISC-V SoC architecture. Jiwon presented her research on performance anlysis of GPU-PIM address mapping approaches. Good job, Yewon and Jiwon!

item.title: CSArch Lab members attended CSC 2024
item.description: CSArch Lab members attended KIISE Computer System Society Conference 2024 (CSC 2024) held in Pyeongchang, Gangwon-do. Our lab members had a great time as the great researchers on computer system research fields presented keynotes and their research work during the conference. Prof. Gunjae Koo served on the organizing committee for CSC 2024.

item.title: Hyunwoo presented at KCC 2023
item.description: Hyunwoo presented his research regarding the analysis of embedding cache for recommendation systems at Korea Computer Congress 2023 (KCC 2023) held in Jeju-si, Jeju-do. Our lab members also attended the conference. Good job, Hyunwoo!

item.title: CSArch Lab members attended CSC 2023
item.description: CSArch Lab members attended KIISE Computer System Society Conference 2023 (CSC 2023) held in Pyeongchang, Gangwon-do. Our lab members had a great time as the great researchers on computer system research fields presented keynotes and their research work during the conference. Jonghyun and Boyoung presented their research work during the Student Poster Session. Prof. Gunjae Koo served on the organizing committee for CSC 2023.

item.title: Boyoung and Jongmin presented at KSC 2022
item.description: Boyoung and Jongmin presented their research work at Korea Software Congress 2022 (KSC 2022) held in Jeju-si, Jeju-do. Boyoung presented her research on performance analysis of a genome alignment application. Jongmin presented his research on low-overhead secure architectures at a Ph.D. forum of KSC 2022. Our lab memebers also attended the conference to have a great time. Good job, guys!

item.title: Hunjong presented at KCC 2022
item.description: Hunjong presented his research on the characteristics of GCN kernels on accelerator architectures at Korea Computer Congress 2022 (KCC 2022) held in Seoguipo-si, Jeju-do. Our lab members also attended the conference. Good job, Hunjong!

item.title: CSArch Lab members attended CSC 2022
item.description: CSArch Lab members attended KIISE Computer System Society Conference 2022 (CSC 2022) held in Pyeongchang, Gangwon-do. Our lab members had a great time as the great researchers on computer system research fields presented keynotes and their research work during the conference. Prof. Gunjae Koo served on the organizing committee for CSC 2022. Our lab members also helped organizing the conference.

item.title: Inje, Jonghyun, and Seungho presented at KSC 2021
item.description: Inje, Jonghyun, and Seungho presented their research work at Korea Software Congress 2021 (KSC 2021) held in Pyeongchang-gun, Gangwon-do. Inje presented his research on GCN inference performance with respect to graph features. Jonghyun presented his research on data cache of modern GPU architecture. Seungho presented his research on characteristics of GPU memory side-channels. Our lab members also attended the conference to have a great time. Good job, guys!

item.title: Inje presented at KCC 2021
item.description: Inje presented his research on the characteristics of GCN inference models at Korea Computer Congress 2021 (KCC 2021) held in Seoguipo-si, Jeju-do. Our lab members also attended the conference to have a great time. Good job, Inje!
